Name: Chainlink
KeyNotes: Decentralized oracle network for data feeds
SecurityAssumptions: Relies on node operators and crypto-economic incentives

Name: Chainlink CCIP
KeyNotes: Cross-chain messaging and token transfer protocol
SecurityAssumptions: Relies on Chainlink oracle network and risk management network

Name: LayerZero
KeyNotes: Omnichain messaging protocol using oracle + relayer
SecurityAssumptions: Security depends on oracle and relayer configuration

Name: Wormhole
KeyNotes: Cross-chain messaging bridge with guardian network
SecurityAssumptions: Security depends on guardian network quorum

Name: Axelar
SecurityAssumptions: Security depends on Axelar validator set
